detail_desc: Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top of the front. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
3/4-length leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Elastic hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back. One of the hairbands is patterned.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. Round, gathered neckline with an opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Trousers in softly draping mulberry silk with pockets in the side seams, a regular waist with covered elastication, and straight, wide legs.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Sports jacket with a print motif on the chest, small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Chinos in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Small leather shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a decorative metal catch and concealed magnetic fastener. One inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 2.5x10x17 cm.
Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Front fastening and adjustable shoulder straps that join at the back.
Handbag in soft imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 27x29 cm.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.

Cold shoulder playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, short sleeves with a frill trim at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Block-coloured swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Denim shirt in cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Non-wired nursing bra in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Padded, opening cups with removable inserts. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck T-shirt in soft viscose jersey.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with a zip down the front with a chin guard and a jersey trim around the hood, down the front and at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Round-necked dress in airy, smocked jersey made from recycled polyester. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Fitted at the top, a seam at the hips and a wide skirt.

Set with a hooded jacket and trousers in sweatshirt fabric. Jacket with a pile-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication and a tie at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge, cut-off hem.
Short dress in an airy weave with a round neck that has pleats at the front and an opening with a button at the back. Pleated, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Set with two hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones that can be worn as a pair or separately. One long earring with a metal chain and two stone pendants. One shorter earring with a metal rod and a stone. Length 11 cm and 7 cm.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist and side pockets.
Metal hair grips in different colours.
Fabric belt with D-rings. Width 3 cm.

Fitted, padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar with integral hood. Zip down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and ventilating mesh panels at the sides. 67% of the polyester is recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
Short, straight-cut dress in a sturdy jacquard weave with a shimmering pattern. Small stand-up collar with an opening and ties at the back of the neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Small, braided rattan clutch in the shape of a shell with a concealed magnetic fastener and narrow, detachable, metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Depth 8 cm. Height 14 cm. Width 20 cm.

Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a covered button at the front and jetted front pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, buttons down the front and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.

Set with a strappy top, T-shirt and pair of cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers in the sides. Straight-style T-shirt with a slightly wider neckline. Cycling shorts with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top. Side pockets, 3/4-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Fitted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and diagonal pockets. Lined.
Leggings in jersey with a sheen. High waist with wide elastication.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections on the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.

Rain mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the top and an elastic strap with a press-stud around the wrists. Fleece lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, embroidery on the front and a low-cut back.
Long-sleeved, patterned jumper in fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
T-shirt in striped cotton jersey.
Short soft jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and scalloped edges around the armholes.
Thin metal hoop earrings. One pair with a coin-shaped pendant and the other decorated with small beads. Diameter 2.2 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in woven fabric with a sheen and elastication at the top and cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif. Relaxed fit with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an ankle-height shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the top, and reflective details. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a low-cut neckline at the back and a high cut at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a crêpe weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. The polyester content of the shirt is partly recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
A-line skirt in twill made from a cotton blend with fake pockets and buttons at the front.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline that has gathers front and back. Opening with ties at the back of the neck and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirts in premium cotton jersey.

Jacket with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
